data.Name: Brave Girls
data.Bio: Brave Girls (브레이브걸스) is a four-member South Korean girl group under Brave Entertainment. The group currently consists of Minyoung (민영), Yujeong (유정), Eunji (은지), and Yuna (유나). Being Brave Brothers’ girl group project, the girls made their debut as a five-member group consisting of leader EunYoung (은영), Yejin (예진), Hyeran (혜란), Seoah (서아), and Yujin (유진) on April 8, 2011 through KBS’s Music Bank after almost a month of promotional teasers. Read more on Last.fm
